 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחַף‎</span>] **verb** ==grow soft, relax== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be soft***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָֽחֲפוּ‎</span> [[Jer.23.9|Jer 23:9]] (bones of one appalled). 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחַף‎</span> **verb Pi\`el** ==hover== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, compare Grünbaum<sup>ZMG xxxix (1885), 607</sup>; Syriac Pa\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***move gently***, also ***cherish***, and ***brood***, compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]<sup>s.</sup> see; connection with I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> dubious); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַחֵף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Deut.32.11|Deut 32:11]] (poem) of vulture ***hovering*** over young; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַחֶפֶת עַלפְּֿנֵי הַמָּ֑יִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ א‎</span> [[Gen.1.2|Gen 1:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); ***hovering*** over face of waters, or perhaps (see Syriac) ***brooding*** (and fertilizing), so [[BDB#Jer|Jer]]<sup>Quaest. in Gen. ed. Lag. 4</sup> (reading '***marahaefeth***'), compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]].
